item.title: Apaar Id Card Download and Apaar Consent Pdf Form
item.description:
Apaar ID Card Download

The APAAR ID card, also known as the One Nation One Student ID, is a unique 12-digit identification number for students in India. It's designed to digitally store and manage all academic credits, including scorecards, mark sheets, degrees, diplomas, and certificates.

item.title: Gaon ki Beti form 2024-25 Apply Online / Download PDF
item.description: The Gaon Ki Beti Scholarship Scheme is a government initiative aimed at encouraging girls from rural areas to pursue higher education. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to eligible girl students so that they can continue their studies.
